body.name: AnkerWork C310 Webcam, 4K Webcam, 12 Megapixel, AI Auto Focus, AI Framing, AI Noise Canceling Mic, Built-in Privacy Cover, and Adjustable FOV, 1080p@60FPS HDR, for Video Calls and Livestreams
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 26 mins
features: 12MP 4K Display: The 4K resolution and 12-megapixel display deliver detailed, high-definition, and true-to-life images to take your meetings to the next level.

Lossless High-Speed Transmission: This streaming webcam uses USB 3.0 technology and YUV encoding to achieve high-speed 1080p@60FPS transmission. This makes your livestreams smoother and more true-to-life.
AI-Powered Functionality: Combines AI autofocus, AI framing, and dual-microphone AI noise canceling to automatically optimize your sound and display in real-time.
Built-In Privacy Cover: When the meeting's over, just close the cover to keep your privacy fully protected.

1080p@60FPS HDR Webcam: With a f/2.0 aperture and a 1/2.5″ sensor, the C310 webcam for monitors adapts to different ambient light conditions, balances brightness, and clears dark light to deliver realistic images, colors, and environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice webcam. Excellent video quality and the auto focus and solo-frame modes feel professional quality.I highly recommend this webcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear Picture and Noise Canceling
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been happy with my purchase for the price compared to other options out there. I mainly purchased this because of the noise canceling so people don’t hear my kids during meetings. It seems like it’s working well, but I haven’t thoroughly tested it. The picture quality is good and it sits nicely on top of my Dell monitor without blocking too much of the screen/bezel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The AnkerWork C310 webcam is a peripheral engineered with professionals who work from home or who are looking to maximize the quality of their video calls. The unit can be seamlessly mounted onto your choice of monitor before being plugged into a computer where it will go to work capturing the user at a 1080p resolution and 60fps with High Dynamic Range to boot. This will optimize the image quality that the user broadcasts, while the automatic adjustment functionality will change its settings according to the ambient light for the clearest images and colors possible.The AnkerWork C310 webcam supports a field of view ranging from 60 to 95-degrees and also ensures synced streamingEnhanced Video Quality - Users are seeking webcams that can capture high-definition video with HDR and automatic adjustment settings to optimize image quality.2. Seamless Mounting - Professionals working from home need webcams that can be easily mounted onto their monitors for convenience and flexibility.3. Wide Field of View - Webcams with a wide field of view are in high demand as they offer a broader perspective for video calls and streaming.Industry Implications1. Home Office Equipment - The demand for high-quality webcams with automatic light adjustment and HDR capabilities is driving innovation in the home office equipment industry.2. Computer Peripherals - Innovative webcams that offer seamless mounting options and a wide field of view are disrupting the computer peripherals industry.3. Video Conferencing Solutions - The need for enhanced video quality and optimized image display in professional video calls is creating opportunities for disruptive innovation in the video conferencing solutions industry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for plug n play
reviews.reviewText: Works great for remote work. No adjustments needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crystal Clear and Worth Every Penny!
reviews.reviewText: Just received my AnkerWork C310 Webcam and I'm beyond thrilled with its performance. Here's what I absolutely adore about this product:Superior Call Quality: During my video calls, everyone kept pointing out how crisp and clear my camera feed was. The 12MP 4K display genuinely enhances my video conferencing experience by delivering true-to-life images.Seamless Integration with MacOS: I've used multiple webcams in the past and often bumped into compatibility issues. But the C310 was plug-and-play with my MacOS without any hitches.Decent AI Features: The AI functionalities are commendable, especially the AI autofocus and the AI noise canceling mic. While I'd rate its AI capabilities as moderate, it gets the job done and enhances my video quality and audio clarity.Thoughtful Design Additions: The built-in privacy cover is a simple yet significant feature that ensures my privacy post-meetings. It's reassuring to have this small but essential protective barrier.Value for Money: For the price point, especially with the current deal, it's a steal. The performance and features you get out of this are easily comparable to high-end models in the market.To anyone in need of a solid webcam for both professional and personal use, the AnkerWork C310 is a no-brainer. Definitely elevates my meetings and livestreams to the next level!Would highly recommend it! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will need a couple of updates but overall a better deal
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Anker PowerConf C200 2K version for quite a few months now and the 2k one was such a bang for the buck that I had to try the 4k C310. It was obviously better than the 2k one but I can also confirm that it is so much better that it is worth the extra amount to spring for this one if you can. This is saying a lot because the 2k one was already better than my previous experiences with Logitech's Streamcam, c920, c270, and Razers Kiyo Pro.Now the c310 (4k) only came out a little over two weeks ago, and I've only been using it for a few hours but there are only a couple things that I think they can take care of with some updates.1. There is a small issue with the auto settings, I can turn them all off but the camera tries to still auto adjust for things even though the settings are off. This could be the issue that some people are having with the focus but this should be easily addressed in a firmware update and it hasn't been that big of a deal in my use case. As a matter of fact the auto adjusted settings work better on the c310 versus the c200 in my use cases. Just needs the option to have it not adjust anymore after I have it set to off.2. There is no step between 1080p and 4k. This isn't really a necessary thing for most people but I think it would be a great "to have" for this camera. If it is possible having that step at 2k 60fps (or 45) between the 1080 60fps and 4k 30fps would be that extra icing on the cake especially with Lossless. Having that extra versatility would make this such a well rounded camera for multiple use cases.
You always need good lighting and knowledge about cameras.

Gute Webcam für Videokonferenzen MS Teams, ZOOM etc. Treiber sofort automatisch plug&play erkannt, Firmware Update nach App Installation hat sehr gut funktioniert. Gute umfangreiche Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Sehr gute und preisgünstige und bessere Alternative zu sogenannten "gehypten teuren Webcams" wie z.b. Logitech Brio etc. Bin zufrieden :-)

reviews.reviewTitle: Cercate un prodotto al di sopra della media alla metà del prezzo? continuate a leggere
reviews.reviewText: Nel corso degli anni di pandemia le webcam sono state tra i prodotti più inflazionate al pari quasi delle mascherine. Se ne trovavano poche perchè la domanda è balzata di botto e quindi quelle che c'erano sono andate via come il pane. Dopo 3 anni le cose sono cambiate ed i produttori si sono concentrati non solo su prodotti dalla scarsissima qualità ma anche su prodotti di un certo livello. Anker fa prodotti che da sempre mi danno sensazione di qualità e li preferisco se li trovo, specie in offerta, in particolare powerbank ed accessori. Ho comprato in offerta la webcam in questione a 86 euro che può sembrare molto per una webcam ma dipende dall'uso che se ne fa, non la sfrutto ovviamente in 4k perchè uno stream del genere necessita di parecchia banda ma in 1080p fa tutto il suo effetto. In effetti potevo prendere anche il modello inferiore che a 49 euro secondo me è un affare. Nella valutazione ho tenuto conto della futuribilità dell'oggetto perchè un domani magari mi riuscirà facile sfruttare anche il 4k. Menzione speciale per i microfoni che a detta di chi ascolta sono veramente cristallini. Futuri aggiornamenti firmware faranno la differenza, c'è ancora qualcosa da correggere sulla luminosità e l'esposizione. Sono andato anche in diretta su una tv da collegato ed i tecnici si sono complimentati per la qualità, quasi non si avvertiva che fossi fuori studio. Per un passo successivo ci vuole solo una buona fotocamera Sony collegata in ingresso al PC, allora si che la musica cambia ma per i prossimi 4/5 anni questa qualità è più che ottima.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great overall webcam for the money
reviews.reviewText: The AnkerWork C310 webcam has truly impressed me with its exceptional video quality, AI framing, and reliable auto brightness/exposure control. I've experienced crisp and clear visuals during video calls and streaming sessions, and the AI framing generally keeps me centered in the frame, even though it occasionally struggles with dark clothing. What sets this webcam apart is its ability to adapt to various lighting conditions, ensuring that I always look my best without the need for constant adjustments. Despite a minor issue, the AnkerWork C310 has become my go-to choice for video conferencing and streaming, making my virtual experiences more enjoyable and professional.

Love that this isn’t just a typical webcam that shows a wide angle view of the office. Have it setup to zoom in on my face wherever I am in my office so you see me and not the clutter. Very easy to use and to setup.
